### Context

This dataset is a base R dataset, HousePrices. It contains sales prices of houses sold in the city of Windsor, Canada, during July, August and September, 1987. It was originally from Paul Anglin and Ramazan Gencay, "Semiparametric Estimation of a Hedonic Price Function", Journal of Applied Econometrics, Vol. 11, No. 6, 1996, pp. 633-648. We can find more information here. <http://qed.econ.queensu.ca/jae/1996-v11.6/anglin-gencay/>

### Content

**Attribute information:**  
1) Price: sell price of the house  
2) Lotsize: lot size  
3) Bedrooms: number of bedrooms  
4) Bathrooms: number of bathrooms  
5) Stories: number of story  
6) Driveway: does the house have a driveway?  
7) Recreation: does the house have a recreational room?  
8) Fullbase: does the house have a full finished basement?  
9) Gasheat: does the house use gas for hot water heating?  
10) Aircon: is there central air conditioning?  
11) Garage: number of garage places  
12) Prefer: is the house located in the preferred neighborhood of the city?  
13) [Target] Class: if the sell price is equal to or greater than 50000
